article:
{{Infobox website
| launch date = 1998 alexa = 1,251 () url = [http://www.break.com/ break.com] owner = Break Media
}} 'Break.com' (formerly 'Big-boys.com') is a humor website founded in 1998 that
features comedy videos, flash games, and pictures among other material. The
chief executive officer of Break is Keith Richman. The web site's target
audience is men 18-35. {{cite news |url=http://money.cnn.com/-
2007/02/09/technology/media_youtube/index.htm|title=Big media beats up on
YouTube|author=Paul R. La Monica|publisher=CNNMoney.com|date=2007-02-09|accessdate=2007-04-
09}}
